dict.string:
require_cmd "${TM_HG:=hg}" "If you have installed hg, then you need to either update your <tt>PATH</tt> or set the <tt>TM_HG</tt> shell variable (e.g. in Preferences / Advanced)"
if [[ -d "$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" ]] then export WorkPath="$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY"; cd "$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" else export WorkPath="$TM_DIRECTORY"; cd "$TM_DIRECTORY" fi
: ${TM_RUBY:=ruby} FORMAT_LOG="${TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT}/format_log.rb" HG_STYLE="${TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT}/map-cmdline.changelog"
if [[ $TM_HG_LOG_LIMIT != 0 ]] then HG_LIMIT="-l ${TM_HG_LOG_LIMIT:=10}" fi
HG_STYLE_TMP='"$HG_STYLE"' TM_HG_TMP='"$TM_HG"'
if [[ -z $TM_SELECTED_FILES ]]; then "$TM_HG" log $HG_LIMIT --style "$HG_STYLE" "$TM_FILEPATH" 2>&1 |"$TM_RUBY" -- "$FORMAT_LOG" else eval "$TM_HG_TMP" log $HG_LIMIT --style "$HG_STYLE_TMP" "$TM_SELECTED_FILES" 2>&1 |"$TM_RUBY" -- "$FORMAT_LOG" fi
